item.description:
Notice the time change. Meeting at Barnes and Noble at 6:30

and going to the movie after 7:00 p m.

Meeting at B & N earlier is too early for me.

Then we might go somewhere for coffee after the movie to discuss it.

http://www.google.com/movies?hl=en&near=New+Haven,+CT&sort=1&ei=CvDWT5aPD7SK6QG_9ZSwAw&mid=65bdc6e34fc3c8cf

www.google.com/movies?hl=en&near=New+Haven,+CT&sort=1&ei=CvDWT5aPD7SK6QG_9ZSwAw&mid=65bdc6e34fc3c8cf

Â 

Those of you who live East and West of New Haven do not

Have to RSVP No and say that it is too far for you to travel.

I will delete that post if I read it.

I will give more detailed information of where to meet only to those

Who RSVP Yes or who E-mail me directly.,

June starts the 3 strikes you are out rule.

RSVP Yes 3 times and not show up you are deleted

from the group.

This 3 Strikes you are out and deleting those who have not come to the

Site for over a year is "thinning out the herd".

Rather have a small group of dedicated members instead of

a large group who do not get involved or even check out the site.

It is very rude and disrespectful to the rest of the Group Members

To RSVP Yes and make us have to wait for you when you are not going to come.

More information was given on this in a recent memo.

Mike B

Organizer
item.how_to_find_us: I will contact those who RSVP Yes.

group.name: Greater New Haven Unknown Zone Meetup Group

item.name: Unknown Zone @ Madagascar 3: Europe's Most Wanted
